name: Sofa
desc: It is a piece of furniture typically designed to seat two or more people, with a padded seat and backrest, and with armrests. It can be placed in a living room or family room for seating and relaxation.

reviews.msg: Very comfortable, and soft and comfy

name: chair
desc: Shop our collection of high-quality chairs for home or office. Stylish and comfortable, our ergonomic designs offer durability, function, and a range of colors and finishes.

reviews.msg: Very comfortable, and soft and comfy

name: lamp
desc: Illuminate your space with our range of stylish lamps. Our collection includes electric and battery-powered lamps with a variety of shades and designs to suit any decor. Browse now and brighten up your home or office!

name: clock
desc: Never be late again with our collection of stylish clocks. From classic analog to modern digital designs, we have something for everyone. Our clocks come in a range of sizes, colors, and materials to complement any room. Browse now and keep time in style!

name: frame
desc: Display your cherished memories with our collection of high-quality frames. From classic wooden designs to sleek metal finishes, we have a variety of styles to suit any decor. Our frames come in a range of sizes to fit your favorite photos perfectly. Browse now and showcase your special moments!

name: Vase
desc: Add a touch of elegance to your home with our stunning vase collection. Our vases come in a variety of materials, shapes, and sizes to complement any decor. Whether you're looking for a statement piece or a simple accent, we have something for everyone. Browse now and elevate your interior design!
